Text:
many thanx for this post thegreenfrog but where are the remaining series of GOW???
I m still waiting...

Smooth_Passion: From what I know, thegreenfrog has always come through before and you will not be disappointed.  It seems that putting these uploads together is a lot of work and these things take time - especially the larger collection style stuff.  

Thank you Greenfrog for your continuing efforts.  You are so kind to share what you have and it is definitely appreciated.

"Many thanks ... but" ???

How about:

Many thanks, thegreenfrog, AND I look forward to your future work!  Might I suggest a GOW torrent next?  Much appreciated.

Sounds better to me. :)
